scripts.build: bun run build:packages && bun run build:apps
scripts.build:packages: cd packages/database && bun run build && cd ../schemas && bun run build && cd ../types && bun run build
scripts.build:apps: cd apps/api && bun run build && cd ../web && bun run build
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules apps/*/node_modules packages/*/node_modules apps/*/dist packages/*/dist apps/web/.next bun.lockb
